resources.string: An application to help you check your daily water needs. Try it now!

Water requirement calculator is an Android application to calculate the amount of water requirement so that someone can know the amount of water they need per day. 

Copyright © 2024–2025 
Athallah Khansa Ziven Jaya Bahtiar. 
All rights reserved.

Body weight: %1$s kg
Age range: %2$s

Water per day: %3$.2f ml
